EmailTemplate.name: ATMaas.Email 7.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: 5 Questions to Reveal Where You Stand
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Explore How ATM as a Service Frees Your FI to Focus on the Future ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Is {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}} hoping to achieve a better ATM customer experience without heavily impacting costs?
That’s just one of five questions that can instantly reveal whether ATM as a Service could solve your top ATM challenges at {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}}…or not.
Take the test now. <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/banking/would-atm-as-a-service-work-for-me?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ATMasaservise&utm_content=email7&utm_industry=banking]]>
You’ll also clarify areas of channel dysfunction and help build the case for your stakeholders and board if ATM as a Service is the answer. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
